mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERINFO (MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NAME, REGDATE, MEMBER_ISSOCIAL) VALUES ((select nvl(max(MEMBER_ID), 0)+1 from MEMBERINFO), #{email}, #{name}, SYSDATE, #{socialCompare})
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_ISSOCIAL FROM MEMBERINFO WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL=#{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERINFO SET PASSWORDAUTHKEY = #{passwordAuthKey} WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{email}
UPDATE MEMBERINFO SET PASSWORDAUTHSTATUS = #{passwordAuthStatus} WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{email}
UPDATE MEMBERINFO SET MEMBER_PASSWORD = #{password} WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{email}
UPDATE MEMBERINFO SET SESSIONID = #{sessionId}, SESSIONTIMEOUT = #{sessionLimit} WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBERINFO WHERE SESSIONID = #{sessionId} and SESSIONTIMEOUT > SYSDATE
